lines.text:
[as Grice drives full speed toward the club]
If we're going for a drink, I want to be alive to enjoy it!

[finding Melborne doing pushups in his office]
Mr. Melborne, what are you doing down there?
I want everyone here to smell like a distillery.
Yes, he was going to kill me. And you. Things like that tend to make me impulsive.
Will you take a look at the engine in this thing?
No, but I have a general idea.
So do some of us. Well, cheer up.
